SEARCH
Package gw.document

Class ContentDisposition

java.lang.Object
gw.xml.parser2.XSDEnumeratedType
gw.document.ContentDisposition
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ContentDisposition extends XSDEnumeratedType
Used to specify the type of disposition for file content downloads in configuration: DEFAULT, INLINE or ATTACHMENT
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final ContentDisposition
    ATTACHMENT
    'attachment' content disposition, i.e., request the browser to only download the content (and possibly launch an external application if so configured).
    static final ContentDisposition
    DEFAULT
    System configured 'default' content disposition.
    static final ContentDisposition
    INLINE
    'inline' content disposition, i.e., request the browser to directly load and display the content if it can.

    Fields inherited from class gw.xml.parser2.XSDEnumeratedType

    _key

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    protected void
    addKey(String key, XSDEnumeratedType value)
    Should add the given key and value to the subclass's table of types.
    static ContentDisposition
    getDefaultContentDisposition()
    Returns the default content distribution type, 'inline' or 'attachment', to use if specified by the 'DefaultContentDispositionMode' configuration parameter, ATTACHMENT otherwise.
    static ContentDisposition
    getDefaultDocumentContentDisposition()
    Returns the default content distribution type for documents, 'inline' or 'attachment', to use if specified by the 'DocumentContentDispositionMode' configuration parameter, getDefaultContentDisposition() otherwise.
    static ContentDisposition
    getTypeByName(String value)
    Converts the given string to the closest matching ContentDisposition or DEFAULT if it can't determine a mapping

    readResolve()

  • Field Details

    • DEFAULT

      public static final ContentDisposition DEFAULT
      System configured 'default' content disposition. 'true' is equivalent.

    • INLINE

      public static final ContentDisposition INLINE
      'inline' content disposition, i.e., request the browser to directly load and display the content if it can. 'view' is equivalent.

    • ATTACHMENT

      public static final ContentDisposition ATTACHMENT
      'attachment' content disposition, i.e., request the browser to only download the content (and possibly launch an external application if so configured).

    • getTypeByName

      public static ContentDisposition getTypeByName(String value)
      Converts the given string to the closest matching ContentDisposition or DEFAULT if it can't determine a mapping
      Parameters:
      value -
      Returns:
      ContentDisposition

    • getDefaultContentDisposition

      public static ContentDisposition getDefaultContentDisposition()
      Returns the default content distribution type, 'inline' or 'attachment', to use if specified by the 'DefaultContentDispositionMode' configuration parameter, ATTACHMENT otherwise.
      Returns:
      ContentDisposition

    • getDefaultDocumentContentDisposition

      public static ContentDisposition getDefaultDocumentContentDisposition()
      Returns the default content distribution type for documents, 'inline' or 'attachment', to use if specified by the 'DocumentContentDispositionMode' configuration parameter, getDefaultContentDisposition() otherwise.
      Returns:
      ContentDisposition
